本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
見出し読み: みなもとのふさあきら

説明文: (?910-939). Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (7), Honchō monzui (3), Sakumon daitai (2), and Wakan kensakushū(3). Poem preface in Honchō monzui. [漢詩、本朝文粋、作文大体、和漢兼作集]
